name: Ekshaan
description:
Vermin of the Depths
The Ekshaan are a kobold culture built upon banding together and being fearless despite their small stature. They dwell underground, perfecting traps and tactics to overcome larger foes.

options.name: Skitterstrike
options.description: You move up to Half your Movement Speed. For every Creature you come within 1 Unit of, you can make an Attack with a Light or Unarmed Weapon.

options.name: Kobold Diplomacy
options.description: Gain +1 Persuasion and you can communicate basic concepts through gestures with any intelligent creature.

options.name: Trap Expertise
options.description: Gain +1 Thievery and you can detect traps without actively searching for them.
